I really hoped it was the english dubbed version as well. I absolutely hate dubbed movies but the international print had this cheesy 80s soundtrack that actually makes the movie more upbeat. The chinese print isn't bad but it didn't have the same energy as the international print. So the description could be deceptive for those wanting the international version.
